file.text:
# Cuke
Cuke is a source-to-source compiler that translates functional programs written in Python into C++/CUDA code.
GitHub repo: https://github.com/parallel-group/cuke

### Publication
- [cuKE: An Efficient Code Generator for Score Function Computation in Knowledge Graph Embedding](https://doi.org/10.1109/IPDPS57955.2024.00085). IPDPS 2024.
-
